# Clawup

> Deploy fleets of specialized OpenClaw agents to your cloud infrastructure.

Clawup is an open-source CLI tool that deploys, orchestrates, and monitors AI agent teams. Define agent identities in YAML, provision infrastructure with one command, and track changes in git.

## Key Features

- One-command deployment of OpenClaw agents to AWS or Hetzner Cloud
- Identity system: composable YAML definitions for agent personality, skills, model, and tools
- Built-in agents: Juno (PM), Titus (Engineer), Scout (QA)
- Built-in integrations with Linear, GitHub, and Slack
- Secure infrastructure via Pulumi (VPC, EC2, networking)
- Encrypted mesh networking via Tailscale (no public ports)
- Real-time agent monitoring and SSH access
- Cost estimation and resource management
